title: Regional Tournament, when is it?
body:
Just curious on when the Regional tournament is as on one hand we are being told that it is in August when on the Riot page it says its on April 9th to the 10th. Just would like some confirmation from a Rioter for when the dates are!

Thanks!

replies.body: Its April 9th and 10th. In future its probably best to trust the Riot page

Awesome! Thanks for that, any chance of what time might the Regional tournament will be held on both days?

Thanks!
